704900.name: Puzzle Pirates - Defiant Armada pack
704900.description:
This special pack contains exclusive items suitable for any pirate.

Pack Includes:

  • Permanent Crimson Savvy Crossbones Hat. This crimson colored hat is exclusive to this DLC and will never dust. The bandana will be chosen at random between gold, yellow, or white.
  • Defiant Sloop. A special limited edition ship with a Defiant theme.
  • 4 crimson chromas. These allow you to dye one of the colors on a piece of clothing.
  • Crimson colored rat pet. This loyal new friend is permanently bound to your pirate.

Items can only be accepted by one Pirate on the account. Savvy Crossbones Hats and rats bind on acceptance. Items that bind or are permanent will bind to the Pirate that accepts the items.
704900.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
